## EntityEventPayloads."ENTITY.ENTITY\_COLLISION" property

Emitted when an entity collides with another entity.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[EntityEvent.ENTITY_COLLISION]: {
        entity: Entity;
        otherEntity: Entity;
        started: boolean;
        colliderHandleA: number;
        colliderHandleB: number;
    };
```
